AI Description: r_flexiblas is a software package for solving linear systems with block-angular structures. It is based on the pre-conditioned flexible GMRES iterative solver combined with a block-ILU(0) pre-conditioner. The software is written in R and primarily designed for efficient solution of large, sparse linear systems arising from computational simulations in various scientific and engineering disciplines.
Core Features: Efficient Solution Of Large, Sparse Linear Systems, Pre-Conditioned Flexible Gmres Iterative Solver, Block-Ilu(0) Pre-Conditioner, Solving Linear Systems With Block-Angular Structures
General Tags: Linear Systems Solver, Computational Mathematics, Iterative Methods, Sparse Linear Systems
